coding.display: Chlamydia trachomatis, Nucleic Acid Probe, with Amplification

valueString: Negative for Chlamydia trachomatis by ___, APTIMA COMBO 2 Assay.  Validated for use on Urine Samples by the ___ Microbiology Laboratory. Performance characteristics on urine samples were found to be equivalent to those of FDA- approved TIGRIS APTIMA COMBO 2 and/or COBAS Amplicor methods.
